title: Analyze PagerDuty Incident Patterns
description: Analyze incident data to identify patterns and opportunities for reducing alert noise
example_prompt:
Analyze the PagerDuty incident activity data to:
1. Identify most frequent issues and their patterns
2. Calculate incident frequencies and trends
3. Determine if issues are ongoing or resolved
4. Highlight top opportunities to reduce alert noise
5. Generate recommendations for alert optimization

The analysis should focus on actionable insights to reduce unnecessary pages and improve on-call experience.
